text:
Sara Lozo (born 29 April 1997) is a Serbian volleyball player.
She played at the 2014 Women's Junior European Volleyball Championship, 2015 FIVB Volleyball Women's U20 World Championship, 2017 FIVB Volleyball World Grand Prix, 2017 Women's European Volleyball Championship, 2018 FIVB Volleyball Women's Nations League, 2019 FIVB Volleyball Women's Nations League, and 2019 FIVB Volleyball Women's World Cup.
She played for Vizura Ruma and VC Zhetysu.

annotations.surface_form: 2015 FIVB Volleyball Women's U20 World Championship
